name.jp: 勇気のイーグルマント

description.en: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.ar: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.br: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.cns: 印有显眼金鹰的披风，强者的象征。全属性+6，最大HP+200。
description.de: Der Eagle Cloak of the Spellweaver erhöht alle Statuspunkte um +6 und die HP um +200. Das Siegel eines Adlers wird stolz präsentiert.
description.fi: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.fil: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.fr: La Cape d'Aigle Valeureux augmente toutes les statistiques de base de +6 et les PV Max de +200. Le Sceau de l'Aigle est bien en vue.
description.id: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.it: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.jp: 勇気のイーグルマントは、全ステータスを+6、HPの最大を+200増加させます。鷲の紋章が記されています。
description.kr: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.nl: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.

description.ru: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.sp: La Capa Águila Tejehechizos aumenta las estadísticas base en +6 y la HP Máxima en +200. El Sello del Águila se muestra de forma destacada.

description.th: The Spellweaver's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +6 and HP Max by +200. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.tw: 所有基礎屬性增加+6和HP+200的行家之雄鷹斗篷，老鷹的樣式將顯現在斗篷上
